Summary: observed sipper lookinh con trail went into house to get camera when came back out with camera observed just after dark
divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed in western sky amber light morph to red. It appeared to be a plasma ball or orb. Appeared very large no sound. Was unsure at first what i was seeing. The object made a slow turn toward the west and vanished. Fist time to ever see anything like this. I know what i observed was no aircraft i am aware of there were no navagation lights visable, I have digital video of event. Will download when transfered from video disc to computer.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Chattanooga
